Uses of Say in com.twilio4j.twiml
 

Methods in com.twilio4j.twiml that return Say
 Say Say.language(Say.Language language)
          The 'language' attribute allows you pick a voice with a specific language's accent and pronunciations.
 Say Say.languageDE()
          Convenience function that does the same as calling language(Language.de).
 Say Say.languageEN()
          Convenience function that does the same as calling language(Language.en).
 Say Say.languageES()
          Convenience function that does the same as calling language(Language.es).
 Say Say.languageFR()
          Convenience function that does the same as calling language(Language.fr).
 Say Say.loop(int loopCount)
          The 'loop' attribute specifies how many times you'd like the text repeated.
 Say DeclarativeComposer.say(java.lang.String phrase)
          Inserts a Say verb into your TwiML.
 Say Say.voice(Say.Voice v)
          The 'voice' attribute allows you to choose a male or female voice to read text back.
 Say Say.voiceMAN()
          This is the same as calling voice(Voice.man), but less annoying to utilize.
 Say Say.voiceWOMAN()
          This is the same as calling voice(Voice.woman), but less annoying to utilize.
 

Methods in com.twilio4j.twiml with parameters of type Say
 void Gather.addSay(Say say)
          Append a TwiML Say verb into the Gather verb.
